name: Little Spark
description:
Number of players: 1 

Supported Hardware: Keyboard, Mouse

Move the mouse  to control the camera and scroll to zoom in and out.

Use WASD to move and the Spacebar to jump.

Right-click to dash. Hold to increase the distance traveled.

Play as a living flame searching for fuel to survive, Your fuel levels will constantly decrease so focus on collecting burnable objects.
